title: AKD meets with US Ambassador
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A discussion was held between the Leader of the JVP, Anura Kumara Dissanayake and the US Ambassador to Sri Lanka, Julie Chung, at the JVP head office in Battaramulla today (14).
The two dignitaries exchanged views on the current political situation in the country and discussed the country’s current economic crisis as well.
JVP Secretary Vijitha Herath also participated in the discussion along with Dissanayake.
